article: a former qwest communications international inc. chief financial officer pleaded guilty thursday to a single count of insider trading , becoming the highest-ranking officer to admit to wrongdoing in a scandal that forced the telephone company to erase billions of dollars in revenue .
abstract: former cfo of qwest phone company pleads guilty to insider trading
